TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputText extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputText Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 和 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML and elements on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件创建的单行文本框中，用户可以输入文本或密码。Use the control to create a single-line text box that allows the user to enter text or a password. 属性指定的最大可以在文本框中输入的字符数。The property specifies the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box. 属性允许你指定文本框的宽度。The property allows you to specify the width of the text box. 若要确定用户输入的文本框中的值，使用属性。To determine the value entered by the user into text box, use the property. 控件提供事件时引发属性更改发往服务器之间的值。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 这允许你创建的事件处理程序执行每次引发该事件的一组自定义的说明。This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控件不提供一种将回发到服务器的内置方法。The control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server. 必须提供支持发布到服务器，如网页上的另一个控件控制，用于以发送回发到服务器控件的值。You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an control, to send the value of the control back to the server. 若要创建多行文本框中，使用控件。To create a multi-line text box, use the control. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来获取用户输入。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/CS/htmlinputtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/VB/htmlinputtextvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例控制使用默认值。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using default values. 它将创建`text`键入文本框控件。It creates a `text` type text box control. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Text"文字字符串。The "text" literal string.| ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor/CS/htmlinputtextctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor/VB/htmlinputtextctorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string type) cil managed

span.span: The type of input control.

summary.span: 使用指定的输入控件类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified input control type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例控制是通过使用指定的输入的控件类型。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using the specified input control type. 它允许您创建特定类型的文本框控件，如`password`。It allows you to create a specific type of text box control, such as `password`. 仅`password`或`text`目前支持类型。Only the `password` or `text` type is currently supported. 此构造函数旨在让你可以创建其他文本框类型，如果变得可用。This constructor is designed to allow you to create other text box types if they become available. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`type` 参数的值。The value of the `type` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 虽然可以使用此构造函数来创建`text`改为通常使用类型文本框控件，默认构造函数。Although you can use this constructor to create a `text` type text box control, the default constructor is commonly used instead. ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextCtor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor2/CS/htmlinputtextctor2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextCtor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor2/VB/htmlinputtextctor2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查以查看是否的回发值控件不同于以前的值，并且如果是这样，则返回`true`。The method checks to see whether the postback value of the control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

span.span: The maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定可以在文本框中输入字符的最大数量。Use the property to specify or determine the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的最大可以在文本框中输入的字符数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box. span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正好在呈现之前调用方法控件。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便其设置30 个字符在自定义属性服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it sets the property to 30 characters in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerender.vb#2)]

Protected Overridable Sub OnServerChange (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时在服务器上更改属性。The event is raised when the property is changed on the server. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须具有启用视图状态事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自定义事件处理程序更新在网页上显示的值中输入的文本标签``HTML 元素。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the text entered into the `` HTML element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextServerChange/CS/htmlinputtextserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextServerChange/VB/htmlinputtextserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便正确引发事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the event is correctly raised.

span.span: Occurs when the property is changed on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时在服务器上更改属性。The event is raised when the property is changed on the server. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须具有启用视图状态事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自定义事件处理程序更新在网页上显示的值中输入的文本标签``HTML 元素。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the text entered into the `` HTML element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextServerChange/CS/htmlinputtextserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextServerChange/VB/htmlinputtextserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置文本框的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the contents of the text box.

value.span: 包含在文本框中的文本。

span.span: The text contained in the text box.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式确定用户在文本框中输入的文本。Use the property to programmatically determine the text entered by the user into the text box. 你还可以使用此属性可为文本框中提供默认文本。You can also use this property to provide default text for the text box. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的值`password`类型控制，请在文本框中不显示值。If you specify a value for a `password` type control, that value is not displayed in the text box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式确定用户在文本框中输入的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically determine the text entered by the user in the text box. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/CS/htmlinputtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/VB/htmlinputtextvb.aspx#1)]
